items.title: Conference / Workshop / Guest Lecture
content: Workshop on "Hands-On UI/UX Design: From User Needs to Interactive Interfaces" on 07.01.2026.

Lecture Series on "Codeless Data Engineer" on 01.11.2025.

24 Hours National Level Hackathon "HackSpora-2K25" on 12.09.2025 and 13.09.2025.
